sample_docs: biometric identification solutions solutions & services products contact emobi, a crossborder remittance platform Background Remittance. Money sent home by workers now largest source of external financing in low- and middle-income countries. It is estimated that every year, Africans, men and women who live overseas in the Diaspora transfert to their respectives countries of origin, about $50 billions US dollars. The money sent by Africans who live in the Diaspora to their home countries is meant to help their relatives back home with their essential needs such as hospital bills, school fees, utility bills, food, housing, etc. Unfortunately, half of that money goes wasted due to the presence of intermediaries and other social and administrative factors. ​ emobi eliminates middlemen, reduces the cost of transaction, creates an Identity for the unbanked and secures the transaction and identity. ​ Go directly to her website : https://www.myyobi.com solutions & services products contact emobi, a crossborder remittance platform emobi, a crossborder remittance platform Background Remittance. Go directly to her website : https://www.myyobi.com

NIMC NIN REGISTRATION BE NOTIFIED WHEN WE START THE REGISTRATION OF THE NATIONAL IDENTITY NUMBER ! Aidentity is technical partner of UGS Technologies, official agent of NIMC, the National Identity Management Corporation Nigeria, to register the Nigerian Diaspora in the United Kingdom & Europe, and so obtain the National Identity Number (NIN). The NIN is part of the National e-ID card issuance, identity verification as well as data harmonization and authentication. Aidentity will be present in the United Kingdom, The Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, France, Luxemburg and Spain (more countries will follow). The process to obtain a National Identity Number exists out of 2 steps. The process of obtaining the National Identity Number consists of two steps. First, the filling of an online registration and appointment form and secondly, the physical presence of the enrollee at the location where his/her biometric and biographical data will be captured or enrolled by us. Lastly: To smooth the process, you may now subscribe for an appointment. Once subscribed, you will receive at time, by email an invitation to book your appointment. i want to be notified when the bookings are open.
